thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 22 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Stapleton Capital Says Board Approved Change Of Name

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Stapleton Capital Says Board Approved Change Of Name
text:
Jan 22 (Reuters) - Stapleton Capital Plc:
* DIRECTORS HAVE IDENTIFIED A NUMBER OF BLOCKCHAIN TECHNOLOGY INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITIES IN RECENT MONTHS​
* DECIDED TO CHANGE SCOPE OF STAPLETON‘S INVESTMENT CRITERIA TO CONSIDER ACQUISITIONS WITHIN BLOCKCHAIN TECHNOLOGY INDUSTRY​
* ‍BOARD HAS ALSO APPROVED A CHANGE OF NAME OF COMPANY TO BLOCKCHAIN WORLDWIDE PLC, WHICH TOOK PLACE ON 19 JANUARY 2018​
* ‍COMPANY WILL TRADE UNDER NEW TICKER CODE BLOC WITH EFFECT FROM TODAY​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
